title: Stream: Maryann Vasquez – DUE
body:
It’s been a crazy week or so for **Maryann Vasquez**, having exploded onto the blogs with one of the singles of the year in the form of _Turn You Down_, she’s now released her debut EP, DUE.

Featuring the previously posted _Turn You Down_, and _Priscilla’ Song_, alongside two new cuts, _Eyes Closed_ and _Freedom_, it’s the sign of an artist with limitless potential. It’s been a long time since I’ve heard a debut EP as self-assured as DUE, particularly the epic-pop vibes of Eyes Closed. Check out the full stream below.
